perturbation.original_text: The Adviser hereby agrees to indemnify and save harmless FASC and its trustees, officers and employees (each of the foregoing an "Indemnified Party" and collectively the "Indemnified Parties") against and from any and all losses, obligations, penalties, actions, judgments and suits and other costs, expenses and disbursements of any kind or nature whatsoever which may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against an Indemnified Party, other than as a consequence of gross negligence or willful misconduct on the part of an Indemnified Party, arising out of or in connection with this Limited Power of Attorney or any other agreement, instrument or document executed in connection with the exercise of the authority granted to FASC herein to act on behalf of the Adviser, including without limitation the reasonable costs, expenses and disbursements in connection with defending such Indemnified Party against any claim or liability related to the exercise or performance of any of FASC's powers or duties under this Limited Power of Attorney or any of the other agreements, instruments or documents executed in connection with the exercise of the authority granted to FASC herein to act on behalf of the Adviser, or the taking of any action under or in connection with any of the foregoing. The obligations of the Adviser under this paragraph shall survive the termination of this Limited Power of Attorney with respect to actions taken by FASC on behalf of the Adviser during the term of this Limited Power of Attorney.
perturbation.changed_text: The Adviser hereby agrees to indemnify and save harmless FASC and its trustees, officers and employees (each of the foregoing an "Indemnified Party" and collectively the "Indemnified Parties") against and from any and all losses, obligations, penalties, actions, judgments and suits and other costs, expenses and disbursements of any kind or nature whatsoever which may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against an Indemnified Party, other than as a consequence of gross negligence or willful misconduct on the part of an Indemnified Party, arising out of or in connection with this Limited Power of Attorney or any other agreement, instrument or document executed in connection with the exercise of the authority granted to FASC herein to act on behalf of the Adviser, including without limitation the reasonable costs, expenses and disbursements in connection with defending such Indemnified Party against any claim or liability related to the exercise or performance of any of FASC's powers or duties under this Limited Power of Attorney or any of the other agreements, instruments or documents executed in connection with the exercise of the authority granted to FASC herein to act on behalf of the Adviser, or the taking of any action under or in connection with any of the foregoing. The obligations of the Adviser under this paragraph shall only extend to costs, expenses and disbursements explicitly pre-approved by the Adviser in writing. The obligations of the Adviser under this paragraph shall survive the termination of this Limited Power of Attorney with respect to actions taken by FASC on behalf of the Adviser during the term of this Limited Power of Attorney.
perturbation.explanation: The addition of the clause 'The obligations of the Adviser under this paragraph shall only extend to costs, expenses and disbursements explicitly pre-approved by the Adviser in writing' creates a contradiction. It limits the indemnification obligation, potentially conflicting with the initial broad statement of indemnification. This ambiguity makes it difficult to determine the true scope of the indemnification, affecting its enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles regarding indemnification; could potentially run afoul of Delaware law regarding fiduciary duties depending on the specific circumstances.

perturbation.original_text: This Limited Power of Attorney shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania without reference to principles of conflicts of laws.
perturbation.changed_text: This Limited Power of Attorney shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania without reference to principles of conflicts of laws, except where such laws conflict with the general principles of equity, in which case the laws of the State of Delaware shall govern.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction in the governing law. It initially states Pennsylvania law governs, but then introduces an exception where Delaware law applies if Pennsylvania law conflicts with 'general principles of equity.' This ambiguity creates confusion and makes it unclear which state's laws truly govern, undermining the predictability and enforceability of the contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles regarding choice of law.

perturbation.original_text: This Limited Power of Attorney constitutes the entire agreement between the Adviser and FASC and may be changed only by a writing signed by both of them, except that the Adviser may at any time change the list of Funds to which this Limited Power of Attorney relates by executing and delivering to FASC a later dated version of Schedule 1. This Limited Power of Attorney shall bind and benefit the respective successors and assigns of the Adviser and FASC; provided, however, that FASC shall have no power or authority hereunder to appoint a successor or substitute attorney in fact for the Adviser or any Fund.
perturbation.changed_text: This Limited Power of Attorney constitutes the entire agreement between the Adviser and FASC and may be changed only by a writing signed by both of them, except that the Adviser may at any time change the list of Funds to which this Limited Power of Attorney relates by executing and delivering to FASC a later dated version of Schedule 1. This Limited Power of Attorney shall bind and benefit the respective successors and assigns of the Adviser and FASC; provided, however, that FASC shall have the power or authority hereunder to appoint a successor or substitute attorney in fact for the Adviser or any Fund if approved by the Adviser.
perturbation.explanation: The statement provides that FASC will have no power of authority to appoint a successor but introduces an option for FASC to appoint a successor attorney in fact if approved by the Advisor. This change creates conflicting positions.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles regarding entire agreement clauses and modifications.
